title: Build NISHQ Trust-First E-Commerce Platform MVP

requirements.text: Create a landing page with hero section containing headline 'Buy with certainty. Not guesswork.', subheadline 'Verified reviews, transparent sellers, and lifetime trust scores — so you always know what you're buying.', primary CTA 'Browse Trusted Products', and secondary CTA 'How We Prevent Fake Reviews'. Include above-the-fold trust signals: reviews allowed only after delivery and usage time, seller history visible to everyone, no fake MRPs or artificial discounts, and trust scores cannot be reset.

quotes: Headline: "Buy with certainty. Not guesswork."
Primary CTA: "Browse Trusted Products"

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays exact headline and subheadline text
Two CTA buttons present with specified text
Four trust signals visible above the fold
Layout follows minimal, professional, authority-driven design

requirements.text: Add landing page sections for 'Why Nishq exists' (explaining optimization for certainty not sales), 'Why we are different' (listing five key differentiators: verified reviews, lifetime seller trust scores, honest pricing, public return patterns, explainable recommendations), 'How trust is calculated' (delivery success, return behaviour, review authenticity, public dispute outcomes), and 'Who this platform is for' (careful buyers, families, honest sellers). Include footer with transparency policy, grievance process, and contact information.

quotes: Core sections: 1. Why Nishq exists Most marketplaces optimise for sales. Nishq optimises for certainty.
Footer: - Transparency policy - Grievance and dispute resolution process - Clear contact information

acceptanceCriteria: All four core sections present with specified content
Footer contains three required links/sections
Content uses calm, respectful, non-marketing tone
Simple, clear English throughout

requirements.text: Create product catalog/browsing page showing products with trust indicators including seller trust score (0-100), seller account age, return percentage, and fake review risk indicator (Low/Medium/High). Display products in grid layout with product image, name, final price without fake MRPs, and trust metrics visible for each item.

quotes: Product catalog with trust indicators
No fake MRPs or crossed prices

acceptanceCriteria: Grid layout displays multiple products
Each product card shows trust score, account age, return %, and review risk
Prices shown without crossed-out MRPs
Products clickable to navigate to detail page

requirements.text: Build detailed product page with trust information appearing BEFORE price and purchase actions. Top section (no scroll required) must display: product name, seller trust score (0-100) with tooltip explanation, seller account age, return percentage, and fake review risk indicator (Low/Medium/High).

quotes: Priority: Trust information must appear BEFORE price and purchase actions.
Top section (no scroll): - Product name - Seller Trust Score (0–100) with tooltip explanation

acceptanceCriteria: Trust metrics visible without scrolling
Trust score includes explanatory tooltip
All five required fields present in top section
Trust information positioned above price section

requirements.text: Add product page price section showing final price clearly with explicit breakdown (tax, delivery, warranty), with no fake MRPs or crossed prices. Include calm CTA button with text 'Proceed to Secure Checkout' without countdowns, stock pressure, or urgency manipulation.

quotes: Price section: - No fake MRPs or crossed prices - Final price clearly shown - Explicit breakdown (tax, delivery, warranty)
CTA behavior: - Calm wording like "Proceed to Secure Checkout" - No countdowns, no stock pressure, no urgency manipulation

acceptanceCriteria: Price breakdown shows tax, delivery, and warranty separately
No artificial discounts or crossed-out prices
CTA uses exact text 'Proceed to Secure Checkout'
No countdown timers or stock warnings present

requirements.text: Create reviews section on product page showing only verified buyer reviews that unlock after delivery and usage time. Each review must display 'Used for X days', be weighted by user history, and show timeline-based display instead of simple star averages. Include automatic de-emphasis of repeated phrases and suspicious patterns, with warning indicators for sudden rating spikes.

quotes: Reviews section: - Only verified buyers can review - Reviews unlock only after delivery and usage time - Each review shows "Used for X days" - Reviews weighted by user history

acceptanceCriteria: Each review displays 'Used for X days' badge
Reviews show user history badges/weights
Timeline-based display implemented
Suspicious pattern warnings visible when triggered
Only verified reviews can be displayed

requirements.text: Add seller transparency panel to product page showing: seller history timeline, total orders completed, disputes won vs lost, policy violations (last 6 months), platform penalties publicly visible, and lifetime-based seller trust score that cannot be reset. Panel must be prominent and easily accessible.

quotes: Seller transparency panel: - Seller history timeline - Total orders completed - Disputes won vs lost - Policy violations (last 6 months) - Platform penalties publicly visible - Seller trust score is lifetime-based and cannot be reset

acceptanceCriteria: All six seller metrics displayed in panel
History timeline shows chronological seller activity
Violations and penalties visible to all users
Trust score shows lifetime calculation basis
Panel positioned prominently on product page

requirements.text: Include decision support sections on product page: 'Who should buy this product', 'Who should avoid this product', 'Honest trade-offs and limitations', and 'Top public return reasons' (quality, size, mismatch). Content must be informative and honest, not sales-driven.

quotes: Decision support sections: - Who should buy this product - Who should avoid this product - Honest trade-offs and limitations - Top public return reasons (quality, size, mismatch)

acceptanceCriteria: All four decision support sections present
Return reasons aggregated and displayed publicly
Content uses honest, non-manipulative language
Trade-offs presented fairly

requirements.text: Build checkout page with simple, anxiety-free design featuring clear escrow and refund timelines with exact dates, security reassurance without fear-based messaging, and reinforcement of platform protection and seller accountability. Use calm, professional styling.

quotes: CHECKOUT EXPERIENCE: - Simple, anxiety-free design - Clear escrow and refund timelines with exact dates - Security reassurance without fear-based messaging - Reinforce platform protection and seller accountability

acceptanceCriteria: Checkout flow uses minimal, calm design
Escrow timeline shows specific dates
Refund policy clearly stated with dates
Security messaging positive, not fear-based
Platform protection terms visible

requirements.text: Create admin panel for managing sellers including adding new sellers, setting seller trust scores (0-100), entering seller account age, total orders completed, disputes won/lost, policy violations, and platform penalties. Allow editing and viewing seller history timeline.

quotes: Admin panel: A backend management system where you can manually add sellers, products, trust scores, and verified reviews

acceptanceCriteria: Admin can create new seller profiles
All seller metrics editable (trust score, age, orders, disputes, violations, penalties)
Seller list view with search/filter
Seller history timeline can be populated
Changes reflect immediately on product pages

requirements.text: Add admin panel functionality for managing products including creating products, associating them with sellers, setting prices with tax/delivery/warranty breakdowns, uploading product images, and entering decision support content (who should buy, who should avoid, trade-offs, return reasons). Allow setting fake review risk indicator (Low/Medium/High) and return percentage.

quotes: Admin panel: A backend management system where you can manually add sellers, products, trust scores, and verified reviews

acceptanceCriteria: Admin can create products with all required fields
Products linked to seller accounts
Price breakdowns configurable
Product images uploadable
Decision support content editable per product
Review risk and return % settable

requirements.text: Implement admin panel review management allowing manual creation of verified reviews, setting 'Used for X days' value, assigning user history weights/badges, marking reviews as verified, and flagging suspicious patterns. Reviews must be linkable to specific products and display on product pages immediately after creation.

quotes: Simplified review verification: Reviews will be manually marked as "verified" through the admin panel, with UI showing "Used for X days" and user history badges

acceptanceCriteria: Admin can create reviews for any product
Usage days field configurable
User history badges assignable
Verified status toggleable
Suspicious pattern flag available
Reviews appear on product page after creation

requirements.text: Implement dark mode variant with deep charcoal or near-black background, soft neutral grey cards, muted green or blue for trust indicators, red only for warnings/violations, fintech/compliance dashboard feel, and high contrast with low eye strain. Include toggle to switch between light and dark modes, persisting user preference.

quotes: DARK MODE VARIANT: - Deep charcoal or near-black background - Soft neutral grey cards - Muted green or blue for trust indicators - Red only for warnings or violations - Fintech / compliance dashboard feel - High contrast, low eye strain

acceptanceCriteria: Dark mode uses specified color palette
Trust indicators use muted green/blue in dark mode
Red reserved for warnings in both modes
Theme toggle present and functional
User preference persists across sessions
All pages support both themes

requirements.text: Apply visual style across all pages: minimal, professional, authority-driven design with neutral colors (white, light grey, soft blue or green), strong typography hierarchy, functional micro-interactions only, and mobile-first responsive layout. Avoid blue and purple color schemes. Ensure calm, strict, honest, authoritative, fair brand personality throughout.

quotes: VISUAL STYLE: - Minimal, professional, authority-driven design - Neutral colors (white, light grey, soft blue or green) - Strong typography hierarchy - Functional micro-interactions only - Mobile-first, responsive layout
Brand personality: Calm, strict, honest, authoritative, fair.

acceptanceCriteria: Consistent neutral color palette across all pages
Typography hierarchy clear and professional
Responsive design works on mobile, tablet, desktop
Micro-interactions subtle and functional
No aggressive or sales-driven UI patterns
Brand personality reflected in all design choices

requirements.text: Implement algorithm transparency on catalog/browsing page where every product recommendation includes visible explanation text like 'Shown because of your browsing history, seller trust score, and low return rate.' Ensure no hidden ranking boosts and no paid placements disguised as recommendations.

quotes: ALGORITHM TRANSPARENCY: - Every product recommendation must include a visible explanation: "Shown because of your browsing history, seller trust score, and low return rate." - No hidden ranking boosts - No paid placements disguised as recommendations

acceptanceCriteria: Each product shows recommendation explanation
Explanation text clearly visible
Recommendation logic transparent and honest
No paid placement indicators
Admin can configure recommendation reasons per product

requirements.text: Create backend data models and API endpoints for Sellers (with trust score, account age, orders, disputes, violations, penalties, history timeline), Products (with name, price breakdown, images, decision support content, fake review risk, return percentage, seller association), and Reviews (with verified status, usage days, user history weight, suspicious pattern flag, product association). Implement CRUD operations accessible from admin panel.
acceptanceCriteria: Seller model includes all trust metrics
Product model includes all price and support fields
Review model includes verification fields
API endpoints support create, read, update, delete
Admin panel can access all CRUD operations
Data persists across canister upgrades

requirements.text: Populate initial mock data demonstrating the platform with 3-5 realistic seller profiles (varying trust scores from 45 to 92), 10-15 products across different categories, and 20-30 verified reviews with varied usage days and user history badges. Include examples of sellers with violations, products with high/low return rates, and suspicious review patterns to showcase trust system.

quotes: Mock realistic data demonstrating trust scores, seller history, and verified reviews

acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 seller profiles with different trust scores
At least 10 products with varied trust indicators
At least 20 reviews distributed across products
Mock data includes examples of violations and warnings
Data showcases both good and problematic sellers
Reviews demonstrate verification and weighting system

constraints: No dark patterns or manipulative UI techniques allowed
No fake discounts, artificial urgency, or countdown timers
Trust information must appear before purchase actions on product pages
Seller trust scores must be lifetime-based and never resettable
Reviews can only be marked as verified through admin panel
No hidden ranking algorithms or paid placements
All content must use calm, respectful, non-marketing tone
Platform must avoid blue and purple color schemes unless explicitly requested
Mobile-first responsive design required for all pages
nonGoals: User registration and authentication system for buyers
Automated review verification based on delivery status
Advanced recommendation algorithm with machine learning
